Title: Myriad of Slugcats [Beta]
Description:
Play Rain World with up to 16 players! This mod extends the maximum player count for Jolly Co-Op, Expeditions, and Arena Mode.

Works with Steam Remote play and Parsec, but Parsec is much more stable with large groups.

[u][b]RECOMMENDED MODS FOR LARGE GROUPS:[/b][/u]
-[u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3026749851]Stick Together[/url][/u]
-[u][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2928752589&searchtext=SBCamera]SBCameraScroll[/url][/u]

[u][b]IMPORTANT SETUP NOTES[/b][/u]
If using Parsec, Parsec caps controller connections at 10, excluding any controllers used by the host. Any additional players must either use keyboard or add controllers through a different remote session, like Steam Remote Play.
[hr]
[u][url=https://discord.gg/cj4tvcjcQ8]Myriad Discord server[/url][/u]
[u][url=https://github.com/Dragon-Seeker/myriad]Github[/url][/u]

This is the opening week beta so please report any bugs or mod incompatibilities that you find!
